text: wa'anzalna 'iilayk -ayha alrswl- alqran, wakulu ma fih hq yashhad ealaa sidq alkutub qblh, wa'anaha min eind allh, msdqana lima fiha min sht, wmbyinana lamaa fiha min thryf, naskhana libaed shrayeha, fahkum bayn almhtkmyn 'iilayk min alyhwd bima 'anzal allah 'iilayk fi hadha alqran, wala tnsrf ean alhaqi aladhi amrk allah bih 'iilaa ahwayhm wama aetadwh, faqad jaealna likuli 'umat shryet, wtryqt wadihatan yaemalun bha. walaw sha' allah lajaeal shrayekm wahdt, wlknh taealaa khalaf baynaha lykhtbrkm, fyzhr almtye min aleasy, fsareu 'iilaa ma hu khayr lakum fi aldaryn bialeamal bima fi alqran, fa'iina masirakum 'iilaa allh, fykhbrkm bima kuntum fih tkhtlfwn, wayajzi kla bemlh
